thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Posts Quarterly Gold Production Of 68,088 Ounces

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Posts Quarterly Gold Production Of 68,088 Ounces
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Avesoro Resources Inc:
* AVESORO RESOURCES INC. - FINANCIAL HIGHLIGHTS FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* AVESORO RESOURCES INC - QUARTERLY GOLD PRODUCTION OF 68,088 OUNCES, AN INCREASE OF 140% QUARTER ON QUARTER
* AVESORO RESOURCES INC - NET DEBT DECREASED BY US$17.5 MILLION TO US$106.6 MILLION AT QUARTER END
* AVESORO RESOURCES INC QTRLY TOTAL COMPANY REVENUES INCREASED 174% QOQ TO US$91.4 MILLION
* AVESORO RESOURCES- REMAIN ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE 2018 PRODUCTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
